question: Meiosis is part of the process of gametogenesis, which is the production of what?

nodes.text: Chromosomes are produced during gametogenesis, which is part of the process of meiosis.
Egg is produced as part of gametogenesis, which includes meiosis.
Sperm are produced as part of gametogenesis, which includes meiosis.
Sperm and eggs are the products of gametogenesis, which includes meiosis.
